    • Uses of Tile in model.tiles

      Subclasses of Tile in model.tiles 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BuildableTile
      Tile that can evolve and be destroyed.
      class  CityHall
      A central building that gathers all the taxes information, only one can be built and all the other buildings must be connected either directly or remotely with road in order for them to be built.
      class  CommercialTile
      Enable to welcome new workers and consume energy units according to the number of workers.
      class  ForestTile
      State-less tile that represents Forest tiles.
      class  GrassTile
      State-less tile that represents grass tiles.
      class  HospitalTile
      A building meant to improve the health situation of the city working on a specified budget
      class  IndustrialTile
      Enable to welcome new workers and consume energy units according to the number of workers.
      class  PolicestationTile
      A building meant to improve the security situation of the city working on a specified budget
      class  PowerPlantTile
      Produces energy to be consumed by the other buildings
      class  PublicGardenTile
      A tile intended only to improve the global happiness of the city
      class  ResidentialTile
      Enable to welcome new inhabitants and consume energy units according to the number of inhabitants.
      class  RoadTile
      BuildableTile that allows building to be built
      class  ShoreTile
      State-less tile that represents Shore tiles.
      class  WaterPlantTile 
      class  WaterTile
      State-less tile that represents Water tiles.
